terms.term: Easily connect the necessary language packs to the application.
Publisher lang files for the Laravel Framework, Jetstream, Fortify, Cashier, Spark, Nova and UI from Laravel-Lang/lang.
Contains translations of all standard phrases of the Laravel Framework, Laravel Jetstream, Laravel Fortify, Laravel Breeze, Laravel Cashier, Laravel Nova, Laravel Spark and Laravel UI projects.
List of 79 languages for form field names.
List of 79 languages for HTTP statuses.
Basic functionality for working with localizations.
List of localizations available in Laravel Lang projects.
The project contains native translations of locale names.
The project contains native translations of country names.
The project contains native translations of currency names.
Fixing a bug with processing fallback JSON keys.
